title: Who Let The Bears Out?  Damn three escaped - 7 remain
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Who Let The Bears Out?  Damn three escaped - 7 remain
posts.post_content:
Need a rug?
Pick up a couple of these bears and you are in business.
No fee payment.
Reg PP G & S - You add 3%
Checks & money orders are welcome.
Prefer any alternative to PP F & F
If you want them all, wire transfer with free registered mail.

1  Randall - BVG 5 - Asking $250

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10169/randall-pb[/IMG]

2  Hunky Shaw - SGC 5 - Asking $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10204/shaw-h.-pb[/IMG]

3  Bender with no trees - PSA 4 - Asking $480

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10338/bender-no-trees-pb[/IMG]

4  Quillan with smudge - BVG 5 - Asking $100

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10167/quillen-pb[/IMG]

5  Purtell - PSA 3 - Asking $105

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10555/purtell[/IMG]

6  Phelps - BVG 4 - Asking $OLD 

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10184/phelps[/IMG]

7  McQuillen with bat - BVG 3.5 - Asking $OLD 

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10160/mcquillen-batting[/IMG]

8  Moran, Pat - SGC 5 - Asking $210

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/18200/moran-p-pb[/IMG]

9  John McGraw with glove at hip - SGC 4 - Asking $350

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/31477/mcgraw-glove-at-hip-pb[/IMG]

10  Snodgrass batting - SGC 5 - Asking $250

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/63550/snodgrass-bat-pb[/IMG]

Shipping is included in the pricing.

If my prices are too HIGH, please respond with an I'll take before they go up:D
Look again.  Did you know there are no polar bears in Jamaica?
